title: Breeding The Female
description: Taken from her family and brought deep into the forest by a werewolf, Sophie is deflowered and used. She soon realizes the werewolf's true intentions for her, to serve the rest of his pack.As the crowd of wolves continues to grow around her, she wonders just how many will she have to service before their appetites are satisfied?This story contains scenes of explicit sex with multiple partners, oral, anal, gangbang, and double penetration with werewolves. Only for adult readers 18 or over!
author: Bree Bellucci
